title: What should I write about for a critical thinking essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: Problem solving is one more component of critical thinking and essay writing. It means that, when you have a problem, you develop a strong outline and defend the proposed solution. In almost all situations, one problem renders the provision of more than one solution. However, before you have at least one potential solution at hand, you will have to consider each and every component of the selected issue. Try to break it down into separate components and see which of them do not fit their purpose. In most essays on critical thinking, this is what you will do. By the way, if you will need a help with writing a critical thinking essay you can get more information about it on this website.

That would depend on who your audience is. Is it for a high school class or for a college class? Is it for a psychology journal or a newspaper article? How educated is your audience? In other words, how much do you think they already know about the subject? Why don’t you go to my website Welcome to Critical Thinking Today for some basic ideas? There are is proprietary information on it but you can use it as long as you cite and reference your essay correctly. If you wish to ask me for more information just sent me an email through the website.
